alert.note: Alert for Dunn; Mercer (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 01 at 8:16PM CDT until August 02 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM CDT/115 AM MDT/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest North Dakota, including the following counties, in south central North Dakota, Mercer. In southwest North Dakota, Dunn. * WHEN...Until 215 AM CDT Wednesday /115 AM MDT Wednesday/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 814 PM CDT /714 PM MDT/, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 3 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible over the area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mckenzie Bay Recreation Area, Twin Buttes, and Fort Berthold.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
